about_the_game:
Rogue Souls is a mix between a traditional "roguelike" and the difficulty of a "souls" game where the most important thing is not the equipment you wear, but how you use it. Immerse yourself in a world plagued by darkness taking the role of a soul, fight against enemies to make your way in the battle grounds, Get items that will enhance your character as you progress, and most importantly, remember that the end is just a new beginning.

Demo version:
- Choose between 3 different characters.
- Use between 12 different weapons.
- Try combinations between 25 unique objects.
- Defeat the first boss of many others to come.
